verbose_text: Meanwhile, 5-(N-ethyl-N-isopropyl) amiloride (EIPA, an inhibitor of macropinocytosis), chlorpromazine (CPZ, an inhibitor of clathrin mediated endocytosis) and methyl-beta-cyclodextrin (MbetaCD, an inhibitor of lipid raft / caveolae mediated endocytosis) significantly inhibited the internalization of DOX@CAuNCs, suggesting that macropinocytosis-, clathrin- and lipid raft / caveolae mediated endocytosis was involved in the internalization of DOX@CAuNCs.
